content.detailedDescription: I was on duty with a group of junior high students at our school in bolivar.  i looked up and caught the cigar shape.  it was very high and much larger than an airliner.  if i put my index finger and thumb up it would have been 1.5 inches between my fingers.  several students watched it for two minutes and then it stopped, blinked on and off several times and then vanished.  i have seen many b2 bombers and jets fly over.  this was too fast and large for that.  no wings.  very white and long.  like nothing i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Glowing white cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 10:30 pm -10:45 pm my daughther and i were outside watering the grass. for no apparent reason i looked west up to the sky and at the moment saw 3 bright lights. at first, i thought to my self  they were 3 bright stars all lined up horizontal. suddenly a 4th light appeared, so i said to my self ..(oh its a plane). then a 5th light appeared, which made me realize this was no plane..For they were not flashing, moving, nor there wasn't any noise. my gut feeling just told me this is ..Weird. i told my daughter who is 11 yrs old ..Mija come here quick and look at the lights but all she got to see was 1 light, due to they dissappeared so quickly as they had appeared. i dont know if what i saw is an ufo or what , but i know i saw something that its gonna be in my head for many days and nights to come...What was it ? dont know..But i do  know that i have seen something that is unexplained in the sky. this is my true story, no i am not insane , nor take drugs, drink, smoke , etc. call it as u wish.
content.summary: Bright lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: For about four minutes i observed for flashing lights in a gradually changing formation. they appeared as bright as the headlights as an airliner. each of them flashing intermittantly and staying in a group. there were no other lights such as the flashing lights that aircraft such as airplanes, jets, and helicopters have, only very bright (they appeared as flashing stars). i observed them for about four or five minutes until they were out of sight toward the southwest.
content.summary: There were 4 flashing lights in a gradually changing formation moving from the north to the southwest.

content.detailedDescription:

ph���nom���ne lumineux changeant de couleur (vert, jaune, bleu), et  de forme, sans bruit, stationnaire ��� premi���re vue mais, en  regardant les photos, on s'aper���oit qu'il s'est d���plac���. aucune alt���ration des appareils ���lectriques, pas de chaleur ou d'odeur. deux t���moins, ma fille et son fils de treize ans. aper���u vers 21 heures sans savoir ��� quelle heure le ph���nom���ne est apparu.

le ph���nom���ne est observ��� de la chambre au premier ���tage par ciel clair et d���gag���.
ils sont rest���s environs trois quarts d���heure ��� observer; le spectacle ���tait tr���s beau. ils n���avaient jamais vu une telle chose. ensuite  ils sont descendus au rez-de-chauss���e vers 23 heures. lorsqu���ils sont mont���s se coucher vers minuit les lumi���res ���taient toujours l���.

nord-ouest. position horizontale, direction caen.
appareil photo num���rique, date et  heure pas ��� jour.
content.summary: Observation de lumières nocturnes avec  des couleurs  changeantes

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work it was about 5:50 am.  i always look up at the sky when i walk to my car.  i noticed a big bright star like object gliding in the sky.  it was very quiet outside and this thing was making no noise.  it didn't move like a plane it was floating in a way, and looked weightless.  it started out looking really bright then as the seconds went by it started to dim then i could see it anymore.  i did get my cell phone to try an get a picture but even tho it was really bright i couldn't get it on my phone.  i have a pretty good phone it takes really good pics and i havnt had this problem before.
content.summary: Bright star-like object glideing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: This object can be watched on my website www.X-miles.Co.Uk or alternativeley  go to youtube  www.X-miles.Co.Uk/whats that, i  filmed this ufo whilst at work last year and it was filmed through glass and there is some bits of dust on the window but thisobject was most definately out there  in the sky,  i thought it was a helicopter but on close examination i feel that this is disc shaped object? i would be interested to hear your comments. i felt something draw me to look up the sky, i  had just purchased a new  camera and was just messing around when it caught my eye. if you look carefully you  can see the chem trail as it goes through the clouds.
content.summary: Dics shaped unknown flying object

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,in spring/summer of '07 late at night i went into my garden,right above my house was huge cross shaped"plane"with red/white ights on wing tips,but it just hung in sky.Then i heard voice in my head telling me to go to park up rd.I was shaking so much i could hardly walk,and scared so i took dog with me.Walking up alleyway by park i saw row of white lights about waist hieght,then i turned arond and behind me were several white lights in a group,got really scared.Suddenly a thought came into my head"oh,it's only humans"and the fear melted away.(i didn't see anyone though)and that's all i remember,i woke up on sun afternoon,fully clothed in bed.It had happened on a fri night.
we've had loads and still have poltergiest activity,plus many other strange events with other people involved.
i have lots odd photographs,but i dont know how to put them up,if you want to see them i can show you my facebook page,but want to keep most of them private,thankyou.
content.summary: Saw strange "plane"above house,went to park,saw odd lights,heard a voice and lost a day and half.

content.detailedDescription:
In the evening of 4/6/10 at about 8:45 pm, i was in the kitchen of my home in carlsbad chatting with my brother. i had just spent the entire day visiting legoland with out of town relatives. it was a very beautiful, warm day that day, so the night sky was very clear and we decided to draw the blinds open, and slide open the patio door to let some fresh night air in. we were just enjoying our beautiful open view of carlsbad from our backyard which faces palomar airport. it is quite commonplace to see planes landing and taking off, even at that time of night. at about 8:45 pm, my brother and i were standing in front of the kitchen window which also faces the backyard. my brother suddenly asks me if i've ever seen a ufo. i thought it was a bit strange of him to ask because we were chatting about a whole different topic at the time. as he was asking me this, i saw him gazing out towards the kitchen window and so i looked out the same way. what i saw were 2 diamond shaped objects very brightly lit, a very golden yellow color. my first thought was they were 2 airplanes in a holding pattern waiting to land at palomar airport. i initially dismissed my brother's sighting of the 2 objects as airplanes and i quickly looked away. however, i quickly looked back since he was still staring out there all this time, and i took an even closer look to see that the objects did not look like planes after all. in fact, in addition to not really looking like airplanes, they were quite large in comparison to the real airplanes in the air at the same time. they were just suspended in air and not really moving anywhere at all. this i found very strange. as my brother and i were coming to realize that we were actually looking at a ufo, the objects instantly disappeared from view!

then, about 15-20 seconds after that, they reappeared again, but this time as 4 diamond shaped objects with the same brilliant glow and golden yellow color. this time they were in formation, sort of like a parallelogram (slanted square formation). by this time, i called out to my husband who was in our bedroom and also to my daughter who was in another room, to come outside to the backyard to view this strangely beautiful sight. so all of us were standing outside my back lawn viewing this light show which was out of this world, nothing like any of us has ever seen. i felt a bit scared, very excited and in awe, all at the same time. i did not want to keep my eyes away from the light formation in the sky, for fear it would disappear once again. 

this ufo light show went on for about 2 minutes. the objects did not move anywhere, again they were merely suspended in the sky, glowing and staying in their slanted square formation. i still don't even know exactly how far away they were from us. i believe one of the "diamond" shaped objects faded a bit and then appeared again brightly during this timeframe. at the end of the light show, the lights simply "turned off" and we no longer could see the objects. it was as if someone had just turned off the light switch. they had literally disappeared!

i captured only one picture shot of the 4 diamond shaped objects on my iphone camera, but not at a good close up view. my brother however did capture about 30 seconds of it on video with his camera. unfortunately, it also was not a close up view. his video is available on youtube.Com at this link: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=9ymzhlarn3m

i'm looking forward to another light show again soon! it sure would be nice to know what exactly we were looking at!
content.summary: 4 brilliant gold diamond-shaped objects seen over carlsbad, ca

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home from work at approximately 8:45 and had started to change clothing and shoes when at approximately 8:50 pm i heard my wife and her brother speaking quite loudly about what they were seeing in the sky.  i quickly went into my backyard and clearly saw what they were talking about.

my home is located in carlsbad, ca and our backyard has a clear, unrestricted view from southwest to northeast. i was startled at first, then settled down and basically enjoyed the view.   here is what i saw:

initially there were 4 objects, very bright in the low sky.  judging the distance was difficult, but my assumption was that these objects were north/northwest in the direction of camp pendleton.  the objects were extremely bright, mostly "gold" or "bright amber" in color.  the objects were stacked two over two and seemed to be in a pretty tight formation, but there definitely appeared to be some spacing between them.  the objects seemed to be moving very slowly or hardly at all - it may have been that they seemed to be moving only because of the brightness of the light.

after about two minutes, two of the four objects "disappeared" and the other two remained.  the shape of each of the items seemed to be cone-like, or maybe to be more precise they were condensed versions of a "bell."   the remaining items stayed in place for a short time and then they also disappeared in a flash.  

one of the things that i found striking was the fact that there was a good deal of air traffic at this time from the very nearby palomar airport.  a number of small planes stayed in the air while i was observing these golden objects.  rather than continuing to land as would normally be the case it appeared that pilots were staying in the air.  in addition, i could see several helicopters also hovering.  this is highly unusual, sinced palomar is a very small airport and gets a minimum of takeoffs and landings.

my wife, brother in law, stepdaughter, and myself spent the next hour or so talking about what we had seen and to a large extent we all had pretty much the same reactions and observations.  

at first i must admit i was somewhat scared, but overall that feeling subsided and turned to curiousity.  i would have run inside the house to get a camera, but didn't want to miss a moment of this awesome sight.  i have always had a very, very skeptical view of the notion of ufo's and the people who report their existence, but after this experience i might be changed forever on the topic.
content.summary: Combination of 2 and 4 objects very brightly lighting the sky north of carlsbad, ca

content.detailedDescription:
On or about 20 october 1996, 0230 hrs.  clear night, unknown temp, but  crispy cold.  humidity unk, however conditions existed where you could see your breather vapor when breathing.  i was an a1c, on duty air force security police airman as a passenger in my flight chiefs vehicle.  patrol car was facing west.  i was talking to my flight chief looking out his driver���s door window.  movement at the top edge of the window frame caught my attention; i noticed a brilliant white/off white light move at the top edge center of the window straight down.  the luminosity of the light was bright enough to compare with venus, however, the size of the light was about the size of a bb or one of the round metal ball links on a pull chain for a light closet or ceiling fan.

the light, (#1), continued straight down from the upper edge of the window frame.  as it reached a quarter way down the space of the window, a second light, (#2), (same size and color intensity) appeared slightly to the left of #1 and began to trail #1 starting from the top of the frame straight toward the horizon.  both lights appeared to be traveling the same rate; #2 light did not over take #1 light and, #1 did not pull away from #2, keeping equal distance from each other. 

as #1 light now reached the middle of the window, it immediately took a 90dg left turn (right as you looked at it) the was no arch to this turn it was previously travelling in a straight downward direction then an immediate 90dg turn and headed west until it disappeared from sight.  the #2 light continued in a straight downward direction until it disappear at the horizon.  both lights did not have any flaring, pulsating, or oscillation of lights.  it was a solid color white or off white color.  no twinkling of different colors.  the lights did not have a tail trail like you would see a meteor reentry.

sightings of both these objects lasted approximately 4 seconds.  long enough for me to yell to my flight sergeant, "holy cow! do you see that!"  as he turned the objects had disappeared, and us being air force police, he was looking for something in his immediate surroundings.  as i was stammered that he did not see anything and i was highly amped up with what i saw, he continued to press me for info.  i told him, he sat back in his seat, looked at me and asked if i needed to be taken for a psych eval.  i told him, as i continue to tell people to this day of that event; you can take me to whoever you want! i saw what i saw, and you will never get me to change my mind on what i just observed.  i just feel lucky that i am one of the few to have experienced the possibility of witnessing a true unidentified flying object. not just one but two on my sighting.

sighting of both these objects lasted approximately 4 seconds.  long enough for me to yell to my flight sergeant, "holy cow! do you see that!"  as he turned the objects had disappeared, and us being air force  police, he was looking for something in his immeadiate surroundings.  as i was stammered that he did not see anything and i was highly amped up with what i saw, he continued to press me for info.  i told him, he sat back in his seat, looked at me and and asked if i needed to be taken for a psych eval.  i told him, as i continue to tell people to this day of that event; you can take me to who ever you want! i saw what i saw, and you will never get me to change my mind on what i just observed.  i just feel lucky that i am one of the few to have experienced the possibility of witnessing a true unidentifed flying object. not just one but two on my sighting.
content.summary: Two bright pinpoint lights wingman type formation, one slightly off side and trailing.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright object coming behind a plane very up high, then it stopped, that's when it looked suspicious to me, i kept watching it, it continue on a straight line and came closer and as it did, it look flat and was falling doing the same movement as a paper sheet would, but calculating the distance it looked as big as a car, later i watched on suns direction and there were a lot of bright things  around the sun (i covered the sun), that was around 3:20, later we saw 4 points very far in the sky and one kept coming down and using binoculars we saw that it look like some transparent like, like a giant condom! :) seriously, but the strange thing is that they came from right up the sky
content.summary: Multiple objects in sky very high.

content.detailedDescription:
While walking through a friend's neighborhood we spotted 2 white orbs cruising around at what i estimate was maybe 2-3 thousand feet. 

the objects were first noticed by my fiance's sister and at first glance i assumed they were birds. i put my sunglasses on and looked again; at that point i realized there was no wing, tail, or identifying shape other than what i would call a "shiny orb". i kept staring as i expected my eyes to be playing tricks on me or for wings or some other markings to become visible but there were none.

they flew in a rounded "zig-zag" path above the neighborhood for about 2 minutes. they criss-crossed each other's path after a short time and then seemed to just disappear. i was able to compare their shape, size, and color with birds and a passenger jet that flew by far off in the horizon. for a second i thought they could be balloons but there was absolutely no mistaking not only some kind of intelligent control but also a shape unlike any wildlife or human made object i have ever seen. i was with two others who also saw the same thing. 

it was a very thrilling experience. i have always believed in alien life but never expected to see any. there is just no way they could be anything other than ufo's. amazing.
content.summary: 2 white orbs flying around above woodland hills ca suburbs. criss-crossed each other after about 2 mins. and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was on top of a hill looking over cadillac taking pictures of the night sky. i had taken photos with planes in them and we have a small airport in town which i live next to and know what planes look like on film. the photo i am uploading has been cropped. no other editing has been done. what i saw was a fast moving light very small it moved in a straight line with slight spinning motions like a corkscrew. it was very fast and barley caught my eye. luckily i had my camera pointed in the same direction and right after the click i previewed glad to see a tiny line when i full zoomed.
content.summary: Very fast light

content.detailedDescription:
The movement you see is my husband not having a steady hand.....The object stayed in the same place until it disappeared. it did seem to rotate...... we saw it for about 20 minutes, but it could have been there longer. when it disappeared it was just gone from one minute to the next.
i would appreciate if you would let me know what you think it was....
we were on our porch, at first i thought it was a bright star, but then i decided it was way to big for a star, so we got the video camera. my husband did nothing to the video except zoom in on the images.
steffi smith
content.summary: I am enclosing a video, you decide what shape

content.detailedDescription: I'm a travelling salesman who's been working around the lebanon, mo area for the past year or so. i had just got done with an appointment just north of lebanon on hwy 5 when the people who's home i was visiting brought up the subject of ufo's. after i mentioned i had a great interest in the subject but that i  personally had never witnessed a ufo, they said they have had several sightings beginning in january and that "they" are out there almost every night. so as i was leaving the lady's father said i'll go see if they are out there tonight. about a minute later he came back in and confirmed they were. this peaked my interest. so we all went outside, i loaded up my things in my van and then i looked skyward to where the people directed me. at first the objects just looked like stars until they handed me the binoculars. i had trouble keeping the binoculars steady until i rested them on a large car jack. as i focused in on the object i saw it quite clearly. it looked like when fireworks explode, the initial burst except there wasn't a burst or explosion. there were several lights that appeared to protrude from an inner object that was perhaps spherical in shape but not visible. it absolutely was not an airplane or helicopter. then my new friends pointed out a few more similar objects in different parts of the sky. the objects appeared to oscillate somewhat about 10 - 15 degrees. my new friends said that on other nights the objects would sometimes appear to make rectangular patterns and even "morph" into one another. they also mentioned that they've seen what they refer to as the "mother ship" that was absolutely enormous but since i did not see that object i will confine this report to what i saw personally witnessed. these "star-burst" objects were there the entire time i stood outside these people's home which was a little over an hour. since these people said that the objects are there almost every night, i'm going to continue to work in that area but watch out for them now. i told these people about ted phillips whom i saw speak at the mou conference last july in independence, mo. i told them about the "marley woods" and how mr phillips wouldn't disclose where exactly in missouri it was located but that it was in fact a ufo hot-spot. also i told them that a lady i met at the conference told me that the marley woods were around the area of licking, mo which was a little over an hour by car down hwy 32 from where we were in lebanon, mo. i'm going to go buy my own set of binoculars and go down there again tonight and see if i can see the objects again.
content.summary: 5 or 6 star burst objects that had spikes or protrusions from a dark centre

content.detailedDescription: While walking the dog early in the morning i noticed two lights in the sky.  at first i thought it was an airliner, but then one light dimed and then one light grew very big, about 1/2 to 2/3 the size of the full moon.  the light then dimed down and then the two small points of light move away to the northwest.  the light grew big like a flare two times.  the whole event lasted about 5 mintes.  the two large flares lasted about 45 seconds, with about 3-4 seconds at maximum.  the lights appeared to be above the atmosphere and possibly as high as 500 miles.
content.summary: High altitude lights and flares

content.detailedDescription: a friend and i where hanging out by this lake only a block from our houses on the south west part of lawrence kansas. there was a full moon and the frogs where croaking. everything seemed normal, until my friend noticed something. "what is that?" he asked, pointing to the horizon at the east end of the lake. above the tree line was a glowing red ball, and it was getting closer. "it's just an airplain comming towards us." i said, knowing airplains don't move that fast, but before i could second guess myself the bright red orb simply dissapeared. everything whent quiet. i remember watching the reflection of the moon in the water being eclipsed by a shadow. so i quickley looked up to see a giant triangle slowly come to a stop over our heads. my friend and i held eachother like whimpering school girls. it didn't make a sound. i remember lights on the bottom of it kicked on. a red, blue, and green light, one on each corner. i was so scared the experience is blurry, and hard to remember. we watched the craft slowly move west over the wheat field behind us, turn back into the twinkling red ball and sink into the horizon. i don't think i've ever ran so fast in my life. we where almost home when we noticed jets in the sky. these where verry obviousley jets with lights on there wings. performing flight patters as they screatched through the night sky, looking for something. i had nightmares for a wile after the experience, but it was years ago now. i wish i had more information for you. when i ask my friend about it he only remembers the red light above the trees. i can't blame him for not wanting to remember. where we obducted? did we experience time loss? where we somehow chosen for some greater purpose where not sure of yet? i simply don't know. but one things for sure, that night changed my life.
content.summary: A big red light apeared over the horizon, getting closer,  we noticed it's triangle shape as it slowly hovered by.

content.detailedDescription:
April 7, 2010 mesa, arizona. time: 05:25  or 5:25am  cold (60f), clear skies, star still showing, dawn coming. no wind. sighting lasted  roughly less than 3 minutes. basketball size object

  i was outside smoking a cigarette and drinking a cup of coffee while looking out towards the sky when i saw coming from the west a solid, round and pure light about the size of a small basketball.  at first, i thought that it might be a plane; however, this also looked very similar to what i saw back in april of 2003.  thinking that maybe it was just a plane but possibly that ball of light, i continue to watch it.   i first spotted it about a mile or two away from me. it was at an altitude of about 100 feet.  it was still twilights (stars could still be seen) and the sun was still below the horizon. i kept watching that the ball of light thinking. "my how familiar that looks.  probably plane's light?"  i kept looking to see if there was any change in the light such as flickering, and i was listening for any kind of sounds of a plane, but i didn't hear no sounds.  just when the ball of light was just upon me of almost 100 feet away, i realize that this was no plane or  jet except only one thing, and one thing only!  it was that ball of light that i saw back in april of 2003! the first thing i thought, "now here is my chance to get that picture of that ball of light which i couldn't get back in april 2003, and to see finally what that ball of light really is by zooming on it with the 300mm adjustable telescopic lens. maybe there some structure in it or around it that i can't see with just my eyes."  i ran inside the house, grabbed my camera, check the settings on the camera to make sure it was on night mode, then i ran back outside onto my porch. then i zoomed onto the ball of light,  and i focus the lens manually, then i began taking pictures.  i wanted to get every possible pictures i could get until i could no longer see the ball of light, or until i was no longer able to follow it.  i took many pictures from the porch until the ball of light object started to get out of my view because of tree branches.  i then ran through the house with my camera still in hand.  i came to spot in the middle of a sidewalk, and i began taking many closes up pictures, and i zoomed out once or twice for size comparison.  thankfully, there was enough light out during the dawn hours which i was hoping that the shutter wouldn't take too long to close.  but at the time, i thinking the shutter was taking to long to close.  i wanted a whole bunch of pictures, but the camera was just taking too long for  each picture shot.  there was a couple of times when a tree branch was almost blocking a clear shot of it, so i move over slightly to a different spot in order to get a clear shot of the ball of light.  i just kept taking pictures hoping i was focusing the lens clearly so the pictures wouldn't turn out  fuzzy.  i was also thinking , "do i have enough time to set up the tripod?"  i quickly decided against that idea.  i was also going to use the auto-focus, but i decided against that because it is unreliable in a quick situation which it takes up valuable time. [from camera experience taking pictures at night.]  any pictures of that ball of light ufo was better than no pictures, and i wanted all the pictures of it as i could possibly get of it. eventually,  a big tree got in the way of me seeing it, and it seem that the ball of light was just getting dimmer and dimmer as it travel away from me (smaller in size too.)  possibly, because of the direction the ball of light took was near in direction where the sun would eventually come up.  i moved over to a spot where i thought where it might pass through an open area to view it which the ball of light should not had taken too long for it to reach that area.  but i never did see it after waiting for it about a minute.  at that moment, i thought "maybe it was getting too dim, and that's the reason i can't see it."  then i thought, "well, maybe i could see it on the computer if there was any light still being emit by the ball of light. "  so i took 3 more pictures, but i still didn't see that ball of light once it went behind that tree.  i then thought, "maybe it instantly disappeared like that first ball of light. [april of 2003]."  i went back inside the apartment, and i looked at the clock to see what time it was, then i noted that time down.  i saw my compass laying on the desk, so i decided to take a compass bearing of that ball of light route which was at 45 degrees of 360 degrees (almost north east).  this ball of light that was seen in mesa, arizona is identical to the ball of light i seen in pensacola, fl back in 2003. identical in shape, in light, in speed, and in altitude.  identical. this observation i just had was much closer than the first observation back in 2003 which i filed a report to nuforc back then.  i had a really good look of it. i saw no out lines of any structure for a ball of light to be attached.  it was simply a ball of light very similar to a globe.  unquestionably, it definitely look like it was a solid sphere, not just a light.  it almost seem like i could almost reach out and touch it; being, it was that close.  it was actually awe inspiring to observe this little ball of light just silently and slowly traversing through the air with it being bright yet gentle enough as to a soft glow to allow me to intensely gaze at it for every little hints of details that it may have for me to see.
 
  since 2003, i been searching on the internet for any logical explanation of what that ball of light may be.  in the past week, i seen maybe several ufo objects, but i started to discount them as being ufos. then last night when i was watching 1 video on youtube showing ancient ufos depiction,  i was giving reason to every depictions why they were not ufos since it could also be intercepted in a different way.  now this may sound a little odd, but i was actually going to start thereafter showing some of my pictures on youtube.  pictures i took over the years, and give reasons why some pictures that other people took may be just birds, or planes, or whatever because there was a logical phenomenal reason for each one, and how some other people's photo may have these kinds of phenomenal occurrences in their pictures.  in another words, i turned on my views to that of  ufos were not real because i didn't see any real hard evidence except for only pictures as possible proof.  and maybe what i saw back 2003 was just something of a fluke created by the  military with their new invention or contraptions.  however, this morning,  i awoke up from a dead sleep at 5:00am which i normally don't get up that early.   i figured, since i up, i make some coffee, then i just go outside to drinks some coffee and smoke a cigarette.  i was probably no more than a couple minutes outside when i saw this ball of light.  now this all sounds very incidental, but i was going agree with some of those people out there that ufos are not real, but this morning quite literally and instantly reminded me again about the facts that  ufos are indeed real.  no questions or doubt about that; they undeniably and truly do indeed exist.  i have pictures of that ball of light now, unquestionably those pictures shows somewhat as evidence as to the  fact that there are ufos possibly extraterrestrial in origin.  and there is very good chance that somebody saw that same ufo too in the phoenix area this morning.  the question is: are they going to come forward maybe onto this site to say, they saw it too.
content.summary: Basketball size sphere or a globe of bright light..  solid and round, not just light itself.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through the woods, taking pictures of the wildlife, when i heard a strange humming sound. i looked up to see a large grayish shiny flying hotdog type craft. i pulled out my camera to take a picture of it, but the battery was suddenly drained. i stood and stared at the space craft for about five minutes. it then shot off westward to the mountains.
content.summary: Looked like a flying hotdog

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in the hot tub by our apartment in the city, when we heard what sounded like the drone of engines. we looked up and saw a cigar shaped object just barely clearing the top of the buildings. the object was about 100 feet in length and had steady red lights on the bottom of it. the lights were rectangular in shape, and there were four along the bottom length of the object. it moved rather slowly across the sky from east to west, it seems to take a long time for it to fly past us.  

it is very rare when a plane flies over our 15 story apartment building, and then it's typically only a small plane or helicopter. we can see to the west of us aircraft approaching the sacramento airport, however, they typically are  traveling north. the object that we saw would have flown right into the flight pattern of approaching planes at the airport. after the object got a couple of miles past us, we could no longer see it, as the buildings and trees blocked our sight.
content.summary: Cigar shape object with red lights along the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
in the summer of 1973, poland township, ohio,  during the afternoon daylight hours a 12 year old child hears a very loud sound, similar to the rumble of a rocket engine. while reading a sgt rock comic book, he hears shouting from ouside, that "apollo" is landing. two children appx. 10 and 9 are outside playing basketball in the driveway. the child in the home races outside as the sound begins to fade. as the child exits the home, the object is now only a small speck moving awaty into the clouds. the 2 children outside were excited and ponting toward the shy. they had seen the craft very close above the back of the house and descibed the craft as an upright cone shaped metalic craft that was dented. it was descending and had multicolored lights and 3 landing legs with circular pods on the feet. the craft was coming down over the house, but it did not land. it quickly rose and disappeared in the clouds going in a southward direction. it was a clear warm day, with no rain. there was no smell of exhaust or jet fuel and there was no visible smoke. the structure of the home had no visible damage to the roof or discoloration. the children were excited and thought it was an apollo landing. it was described as appx. 20 ft high and a silvery metalic with many dents along the structure. this rural suburb is outside youngstown , ohio and is appx 65 miles from cleveland nasa, and 4-5 hrs from dayton, wright patterson afb. nothing was ejected or found in the area around the home after the crafts departure. the craft was a cone shape that narrowed at the top, it did not contain visible external storage compartments or modules. it did not contain a ladder or identification nunbers or lettering. the craft did have observation ports or small windows. the area contained tall grass with wheat and corn fields. there were no bodies of water. there was no follow up or questioning by local police or officials. 
  it has been 37 years after the sighting of this craft in ohio. it was most likely a rocket based propulsion system, and a testing platform for a lunar lander that experianced navigation problems and had to descend for a potential landing. perhaps the pilot even saw the children playing and decided to give them a memory. the craft was dented and most likely had problems in the past and may have struck trees. the craft did not have any stencils, numerals, or identifying symbols, but it did have the required flight lights.
content.summary: Summer 1973, poland, ohio, daylight, a loud rocket sound is heard within house, 2 children see a metalic dented cone with lights and 3 landing feet with pads descending over home, descibed as "apollo", craft rises quickly into clouds in southern direction

Gazing
bright flashing

intersted with naked eye, amazed thru scope, impressed with vid.

content.shape: Circle,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Flashing full spectrum stationary

content.detailedDescription: T he story begins on the night of oct 21,1968. i went to a friends house,[cms/tg/pid], another documented witness, to visit. "t" had to find out which part of the sky the big dipper was in for [cms/tg/pid] high school latin class so after dark we went outside and walked about 50 yds to a large field used for farming which had a few singular trees on its border. i also was carrying "t's" yougest brother,about 3 yrs old, in my arms. it was an extremely clear,crisp fall night with unlimited visibility.We were standing on an old dirt farmpath facing south/southwest when we both;i think at the same; shouted what in the hell is that? though the top of a thinnly leafed and branched tree about 40 yrds away was a brilliant white light with trailing red light which looked like a yo-yo on a string.The white light was large and very bright and very close the red moved very erradically.There was absolutly no sound coming from the objects we freaked..And ran out into the field for a better look. what we saw was the objects began to pulsate different colors red,green and ithink blue the colors would go from dim to bright without going out. i saw then that there were actually 3 objects with 1 in the front and two in the back-in a triangle-like geese fly.The objects then banked in a slow arc and started to head straight toward us-still silent-and moving only about 5 to 10 mph-very slow.The rate of flight speed remained constant throughout the sighting. the objects came directly over our heads-my estimate is they were about 300 ft high and 45 ft in diameter-but truthfully it is hard to judge size and distance on totally unknown craft in a totally clear night sky with no known point of reference-but they were close.When this happened i could see that the light source was on top of the crafts because you could see the bottoms of the crafts ccontrasted against the lights the bottoms were round-bowl shaped and looked as if they were made out of dark metal there were no other appendages or wings.The craft were heading back from the direction they had come from s/sw.We really got very excited-the hair on the back of my neck and arms were standing up.We ran downthefarmpath about 75 yrds to another friends house-[cms/tg/pid]-who also witnessed the crafts pass over his house and until the crafts passed out of visual range. so it had been one hell of an exciting night in a small town aswe told our parents who didnt know what to think and that was that-so we thought.Well 2 days later-oct.23-an article appearred on the front page of the daily herald ,a roanoke rapids newspaper,that [cms/tg/pid] of jackson,nc had seen a flying saucer along with other witnesses in the roanoke rapids area.A friend of my father who was from roanoke rapids told him of a man hunting on the roanoke river on oct21 when his boatmotor broke down.Three unknown objects flew over him so low that the lights from the objects were reflecting off of him and the river,but he heard sounds like tin cans rattling which we didi not hear.Then on oct 25-26 the us air force  called then came to my parents home in jackson to question "t", "h" and i about the sighting. there were 3 of them-a major or col in uniform and 2 radar techs in jump suits from the roa.Rap radar base.Evidently they found out about  us from the article in the paper.The officer was very peed off that we didnt report the incident when it happened.The officer then told us he was associated with project bluebook which we proceeded to answer the booklet questionaire.Iasked 1 tech what was it that we saw and he replied orion which was bs then and is bs now.....
content.summary: 3 ufos seen by multiple witnesses in 2 near-by towns on the same night investigated by air force personnel from project bluebook.

content.detailedDescription:
I am blown away, i just got back from a trip to lake erie, 

i just witnessed and filmed a very low triangle with multi-colored pulsing orbs in each corner over shore of lake erie.

this triangle frew right over me very low

i have unbelievable film footage of the event, historic footage actually.
content.summary: Very low triangle with multi-colored pulsing orbs in each corner over shore of lake erie

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were driving down from los angeles, back home to san diego, when around 8:30pm (april 6,2010) driving down i-5 prior to getting to san clemente, maybe in the laguna hills area i notice 4 bright orange lights in the low southern sky.  knowing that the lights could not have been street lamps, because of the brightness of them, i brought it to the attention of my family.  my father in law looked up and noticed them immediately and tried to get his video camera setup, however by that time we had lost sight of the lights.  i tried to maneuver around traffic to get a better shot on them, but it appeared that one of them started sinking faster behind another.  at this time we lost total sighting of them as they dropped down behind a hill ahead of us.  we continued to travel south on i-5 to see if we could get another glimpse, but unfortunately we could not see them anymore.  from where we were i would say they appeared to be directly south maybe above the nuclear power center just south of san clemente (possibly north of there) or out above northern camp pendalton.  really hard to judge as it was dark, but these lights had to have been seen by many people.  (as i did see this event already reported by another poster.)
my wife, daughter, father in law, and i tried to debunk this as being possible helicopters or bright street lights which might have confused us as to their height in the sky.  but we just could not find a conclusion to it.  especially when we saw the one light drop out of the sky a bit faster than the others.  could have been flares...?  maybe, but the uniformity of the other 3 lights made this seem like they were in some sort of constant movement/formation.
my daughter was quite shaken and scared, but my father in law and i were very curious and rushed home to see if we could find on the internet or on the news of any other sightings.  and as the other poster stated there was quite a bit of traffic and more people had to have seen this.
content.summary: 4 red/orange lights in shape of square s.Ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding passenger with a friend in a honda civic with a sunroof. i had recently purchased my new camera and i love taking photos of anything i see. i was taking pictures while my friend was driving. we were going south, heading east towards mission valley. i saw something black in the sky near the clouds. i knew it wasn't a jet, plane, helicopter, and was nowhere near the flight path of the airport. it never occured to me to stop taking pictures but only to keep taking pictures of what i saw as we traveled. the day was partly cloudy and the weather was beautiful. as we went from one freeway to another i opened up the sunroof and kept shooting as best as i could and zoomed in as best as i could to try and get a better image of what floated in the air for a while not moving in any direction even though the clouds moved freely east from the coast which was only a few miles away. the object shined every so often. the object hovered without any sound. it also looked as if it was very light. there was nothing attached to it. there was only one. as we drove i felt as if i were taking pictures of something no one else might have seen at that time. i only wanted to get a good shot of what was hovering so high in the air, but still can not identify what it was.
after finally looking to the sky once again to capture it once more, it was gone. there was nothing anywhere else in the sky that i could identify as the object anywhere i looked. i have more pictures than allowed to upload and have sent them to this site as well.
content.summary: Minding my business.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving south on i-5 around 8:45-8:50pm when we saw 4 yellowish lights in a rectangular/parallelogram shape above the southern horizon.  going south on i-5 around bake pkwy, they were about the location of the home savings / wamu building, but a bit higher above the horizon from where the roof of the building would be.

the lights were about the color and glowing nature of a street lamp (sodium vapor) but they were in a shape and location that we had never seen before, since we both grew up in the area and i make this drive home on the same stretch of freeway on a nightly basis.

as we drove further south, about the time we got past el toro road, one of the lights faded out, and as we passed alicia parkway, the other three faded out.  we continued down the freeway to see if we could identify what caused the lights, but we were unable to do so.

we were a bit startled, since neither of us has seen things like this before.  i asked my wife what she would have said if i came home and told her what i saw, and her response was "i'd call you crazy, seeing your 'black helicopters' again", a reference to might slight paranoia as a child after an over-enthusiastic experience with the x files.  she was a little shaken, but i'm sure someone closer to the light source would have a better view of whatever it was.

the freeway had a decent number of people on it, and we couldn't have been the only ones to notice there being lights where there aren't normally lights like these.  hopefully someone further south could shed some light on the subject!
content.summary: Strange light pattern above south orange county sky

content.detailedDescription:
Driven by intuition i've been seeing and video taping ufo's over the city in all directions for the past 3 weeks. i have been woken up to horn like tones coming from two different directions, lasting for hours, and filmed them moving, then stopping, and then moving again. i have also filmed them dropping lights out the bottom and spinning around the sides. 

i am a photography student, and have been shooting all this footage on the canon 5d mark ii, these files are great quality, and for the most part are shot on a tripod. the lights can be seen traveling a great path in the sky. 

i didn't have my camera on me, but friday night i saw the lights in camarillo, there were 2 strange ones slowly flying over the city, then i spotted a large light soon a huge craft that looked like a sideways boomerang flew over the car very low, like 200 feet, later i saw a craft with weird pulsating lights over the pacific mall in ventura, as i traveled towards seaward looking back the light was the same height from a different direction, about 100 feet up.

some friends at school saw a blue green flash in ventura as they were coming into town over the grade. they saw 3 more flashes around them as they pulled into their neighborhood, the power went out after each of them, the last one was followed by a bang and humming, the wind then went crazy. 

the first image i'm including is a screen grab from one of my videos, the next two are of a 2.5 second exposure, the cropped in version shows one of four lights revealing a necklace type pattern in the sky. a weird path to travel in 2.5 seconds, with the camera on a timer, on a tripod. 

i have seen so many of these that i am growing tired of filming them. please feel free to look through my footage, there is a lot of it, and i do not have the time to look through it all. each one has a gem of weird actions in it. they will be out tonight.
content.summary: Lights seen and video taped for past 3 weeks, very colorful, strange movement, taped dropping light out  bottom.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were fishing on the northeast shore of lake delta,right by the little town of western..  it has just become dark in the evening and then across from us up above the forest on the top of the hill across from us.. approx. 5 miles away we saw a red light just over the horizon;  first we thought it was a cell tower light as it was red.. but then the light became bigger and bigger it looked like it was a rectangle sitting with the tallest part up and the corners at the top looks a little curved.  we watched it for approximately 5 minutes when all of a sudden a bright yellow light left the red object and moved toward the northeast across the sky... after a few minutes it was out of our sight and the object from which it came from seemed to get smaller and appeared to be a light blue in color.. at times it was hard to see after that and it appeared to be just above the trees at the top of the hill (horizon level)above the forest there.. to this point neither one of us had ever seen anything like this... bill my boyfriend has been hunting and fishing all of his life and has never seen anything like this he is 61 and i am 62 and have done a lot of camping until a few years ago and also i have never seen anything like this.  ( note griffiths airforce base is located approximately 10 miles south/south west of where we were fishing. we had been fishing for a while in the dark, we had a lantern on so we could see our fishing poles when all of a sudden this yellow object flying about 1 mile in the sky in front of us - never any noise  (between the large hill where the red object was that we first saw and us) and continued going across the sky in front of us kind of zig zagging and moving in a south/south west direction after a while it was 3/4 of the way  down lake delta and we saw a smaller white light leave the yellow object and then fly away toward the south. after that the yellow object continued in the direction of lee, ny..   after another hour we were looking up on the hill across from us above the skyline and we could see the previously red object which was now a very light blue and getting a little bigger but not as big as it was when it was red.. the light remained there the whole time, a light blue, but we could barely see it, then it started getting a little bigger so we could see it better and   when we looked up again after an hour a white like light left it and  moved in the sky toward the northeast ..Toward the end of the lake that we were fishing at; we noticed it for a short time and then it was out of sight. around 10:40 we decided to pack up our fishing gear and walk back to the car, which was located on the side of the road in back of where we were fishing...Approximately 1 /10th  of a mile..  we had just got our things in the car when we looked up toward the lake and saw another extremely bright white object between the edge of the lake where we were fishing (located right in front of us when looking toward the lake,  and an island out in the lake  approximately 1/2 way across the lake it floated right above the water and just stayed in place it was like the bright new lights that christmas ornaments now have the ltd lights and it looked like the lights were in the shapes of strobe lights, side by side kind of like looking at a shape like a brick wall but all uniform and line up like boxes all over it; it was like looking at a very bright white star close up.   all of this was a little shocking but when we saw the white light close up at the end, that was almost a little scary;  it was like the object was checking us out after we left our fishing site... note we did have a lantern at the fishing site, so what ever it was would know we left the site on shore.   we think these things we saw were ufo's.   bill told me to get in the car and lets go... i had a better view of the bright white object then he did.. i walked across the road where we were parked and i felt like something or someone was looking at us.   note the night was cool, there was a little fog starting over the lake when we left.. but no fog on the road when we drove home, we could see the stars the entire time we were there.  note everything that was at patterson-wright airforce base have been moved to the griffiths base in rome, ny.  we do not know if this had anything to do with the griffiths base or if it was ufo's... this is something we will never forget.
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Unknown
content.summary: Please see full description below.

content.detailedDescription: Last week i was taking our dog out back to do his business when i happened to look up in the sky to my left over the woods in our backyard.. i noticed a peculiar cloud formation. a very flat and thin-shaped cloud. it was around 11 o'clock at night. there were no other clouds in the sky. i noticed a thin, horizontal white light moving near the bottom of the cloud parameter. it started moving very fast to the left , then back all the way to the right side of the cloud and kept making that course, back and forth. it never left the inside of the cloud. i took the dog back in and asked  my wife to come out and look. she saw this also..Then there was another one and they started criss-crossing and moving up and down randomly at a pretty fast rate of speed.. i thought maybe something was reflecting in the cloud but it was night and there was obviously no sun and no moon was out. i looked for some sign of a light source from the ground like a spotlight but there were no beams coming up from the ground. i have spent many a night out there and never noticed anything like this before. within minutes the whole cloud just disappeared before our eyes and the objects were gone also, with no trace of anything. just a perfectly clear sky. i'm sure it can be explained logically, maybe some kind of gaseous phenomena, etc.
content.summary: Fast moving lights inside cloud formation
